verses.esv: 26 If one member suffers, all suffer together; if one member is honored, all rejoice together.
verses.kjv: 26 And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
verses.niv: 26 If one part suffers, every part suffers with it; if one part is honored, every part rejoices with it.

verses.esv: 10 And while they were going to buy, the bridegroom came, and those who were ready went in with him to the marriage feast, and the door was shut.
verses.kjv: 10 And while they went to buy, the bridegroom came; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage: and the door was shut.
verses.niv: 10 "But while they were on their way to buy the oil, the bridegroom arrived. The virgins who were ready went in with him to the wedding banquet. And the door was shut.

verses.esv: 7 Seth lived after he fathered Enosh 807 years and had other sons and daughters.
verses.kjv: 7 And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:
verses.niv: 7 And after he became the father of Enosh, Seth lived 807 years and had other sons and daughters.
